Applicant : White, Megan
School (district) : Post Falls High School (Post Falls School District)
Role(s) : High School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : Being from North Idaho, I grew up being outside in the outdoors. I am a proud University of Idaho alumni, where I was a college ambassador and participant on the Loggersports team. 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* I am a first year Business Management and Microsoft teacher. One of my main goals is helping students explore opportunities available to them after they graduate. I earned my degree in CTE, but I did not come from industry. I would love to learn more about different opportunities to share with students when discussing their futures and possible career paths.

I earned my degree in CTE, but I did not come from industry. I would love to learn more about different opportunities to share with students when discussing their futures and possible career paths.
